{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Procurement Coordinator",
  "description": "Karsto Global Resources Limited is a&nbsp;wholly owned Nigerian company, established with a view to rendering quality onshore/offshore, project management consultancy, construction and construction management, inspection, repair and maintenance, supply chain and inventory management and rope access to the oil and gas industry in the West African sub-region.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Procurement Coordinator

Job Location:&nbsp;Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are seeking a highly qualified Procurement Coordinator to join our team.
	As a Procurement Coordinator, you will play a crucial role in overseeing and coordinating the flow of materials from requisition through to receiving, inspection, storage of products, distribution, levels and ensuring the availability of materials at the right time and in as a manner for smooth operations.
	Responsible for overseeing all vendor/supplier-related functions to maximize efficiency and productivity


Main Task and Responsibilities


	Assist in the procurement process from requisition through to purchase order placement, ensuring accuracy and timeliness.
	Support the evaluation of suppliers and conduct market research to identify potential vendors.
	Help maintain accurate records of vendor contracts, prices and terms to ensure compliance with company policies.
	Collaborate with different departments to understand their procurement needs and provide timely support.
	Participate in supplier negotiations and assist in the preparation of purchase agreements.
	Monitor inventory levels and assist in forecasting future procurement needs.
	Assist in planning, executing and monitoring projects, including managing timelines, budgets and resources.
	Perform daily administrative tasks like scheduling meetings, preparing agendas, taking meeting minutes and maintaining organized records.
	Prepare status reports, update project documentation and report on progress to management.
	Monitor inventory levels, ensure timely delivery of goods, and coordinate with the warehouse and logistics team.
	Examine documents to ensure accuracy with actual materials received, in order to assess completeness, and conformance to standards and specifications.
	Work with internal departments like finance and operations to understand their procurement needs and requirements.
	Analyze market trends to identify opportunities for cost savings and process improvements.
	Help resolve issues and conflicts that may arise within the team or with external parties.
	Making sure goods and storage facilities are in line with HSE standards.
	Report all accidents, incidents and near misses in accordance with procedures.
	Attend safety meetings when programmed.
	Be responsible for the protection of the lives and assets of the company.
	Stop any work that can potentially harm people, assets or the environment.
	And any other duties that may be assigned.
	Service equipment and tools.


Requirements / Qualifications


	A Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in Supply Chain Management, Business Administration or any relevant discipline
	At least 5 years of progressively responsible experience in a procurement, supply chain role is typically required.
	Should reside in Port Harcourt, Rivers State or be willing to relocate.


Abilities:


	Strong organizational and analytical skills.
	Excellent communication skills, both written and oral.
	Excellent attention to detail.
	Ability to coordinate with different departments and external vendors.
	Training and coachings kills.
	Proficiency in Inventory and Database management.
	Good recordkeeping skills.
	Ability to work with minimal supervision.
	Good negotiating skills.
	Good motivator.
	Ability to work under pressure.
	Strong skills in the Microsoft Office suite and Zoho Work-Place.
	Good team player.
	Strength and stamina to spend a lot of time standing and lifting packages.


Method of Aplication&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;offixrecruit@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email",
  "datePosted": "2025-12-01",
  "validThrough": "2025-12-28",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",

    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Karsto Global Resources Limited"
    
  },

Procurement Coordinator Job at Karsto Global Resources Limited




        
    

        
        Karsto Global Resources Limited is a wholly owned Nigerian company, established with a view to rendering quality onshore/offshore, project management consultancy, construction and construction management, inspection, repair and maintenance, supply chain and inventory management and rope access to the oil and gas industry in the West African sub-region.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Procurement Coordinator

Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a highly qualified Procurement Coordinator to join our team.
	As a Procurement Coordinator, you will play a crucial role in overseeing and coordinating the flow of materials from requisition through to receiving, inspection, storage of products, distribution, levels and ensuring the availability of materials at the right time and in as a manner for smooth operations.
	Responsible for overseeing all vendor/supplier-related functions to maximize efficiency and productivity


Main Task and Responsibilities


	Assist in the procurement process from requisition through to purchase order placement, ensuring accuracy and timeliness.
	Support the evaluation of suppliers and conduct market research to identify potential vendors.
	Help maintain accurate records of vendor contracts, prices and terms to ensure compliance with company policies.
	Collaborate with different departments to understand their procurement needs and provide timely support.
	Participate in supplier negotiations and assist in the preparation of purchase agreements.
	Monitor inventory levels and assist in forecasting future procurement needs.
	Assist in planning, executing and monitoring projects, including managing timelines, budgets and resources.
	Perform daily administrative tasks like scheduling meetings, preparing agendas, taking meeting minutes and maintaining organized records.
	Prepare status reports, update project documentation and report on progress to management.
	Monitor inventory levels, ensure timely delivery of goods, and coordinate with the warehouse and logistics team.
	Examine documents to ensure accuracy with actual materials received, in order to assess completeness, and conformance to standards and specifications.
	Work with internal departments like finance and operations to understand their procurement needs and requirements.
	Analyze market trends to identify opportunities for cost savings and process improvements.
	Help resolve issues and conflicts that may arise within the team or with external parties.
	Making sure goods and storage facilities are in line with HSE standards.
	Report all accidents, incidents and near misses in accordance with procedures.
	Attend safety meetings when programmed.
	Be responsible for the protection of the lives and assets of the company.
	Stop any work that can potentially harm people, assets or the environment.
	And any other duties that may be assigned.
	Service equipment and tools.


Requirements / Qualifications


	A Bachelor’s degree in Supply Chain Management, Business Administration or any relevant discipline
	At least 5 years of progressively responsible experience in a procurement, supply chain role is typically required.
	Should reside in Port Harcourt, Rivers State or be willing to relocate.


Abilities:


	Strong organizational and analytical skills.
	Excellent communication skills, both written and oral.
	Excellent attention to detail.
	Ability to coordinate with different departments and external vendors.
	Training and coachings kills.
	Proficiency in Inventory and Database management.
	Good recordkeeping skills.
	Ability to work with minimal supervision.
	Good negotiating skills.
	Good motivator.
	Ability to work under pressure.
	Strong skills in the Microsoft Office suite and Zoho Work-Place.
	Good team player.
	Strength and stamina to spend a lot of time standing and lifting packages.


Method of Aplication 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: offixrecruit@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Architect",
  "description": "Zinnia Agency - We are a recruitment agency for all your recruitment and staffing needs.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Architect
Job Location:&nbsp;Abuja
Employment Type: Full-time

Job&nbsp;Description


	We are seeking a skilled Architect to join our fashion house and support the design, development, and optimization of our retail, showroom, and production spaces.
	The ideal candidate will combine creative design skills with strong technical and project management abilities.


Key Responsibilities


	Design and develop layouts for stores, showrooms, offices, and production areas.
	Produce architectural drawings, 2D/3D renderings, and detailed plans.
	Supervise construction, installations, and site works.
	Manage project timelines, cost estimates, materials, and vendor coordination.
	Ensure compliance with building codes, safety standards, and brand identity.
	Recommend improvements and support facility maintenance.


Requirements


	Degree in Architecture; professional certification is an advantage.
	3 &ndash; 7 years of experience in architecture, interior or retail design.
	Proficiency in AutoCAD, Revit, SketchUp, and 3D rendering tools.
	Strong project management and site supervision skills.
	Creative, detail-oriented, and able to translate brand vision into functional spaces.
	Send your CV and portfolio to [Insert Email] with the subject Architect Application.


Salary
N400,000 - N500,000 / month

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CVs and portfolio to:&nbsp;zinnia.agency@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note:&nbsp;Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.",

Architect Job at Zinnia Agency




        
    

        
        Zinnia Agency - We are a recruitment agency for all your recruitment and staffing needs.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Architect
Job Location: Abuja
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are seeking a skilled Architect to join our fashion house and support the design, development, and optimization of our retail, showroom, and production spaces.
	The ideal candidate will combine creative design skills with strong technical and project management abilities.


Key Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Design and develop layouts for stores, showrooms, offices, and production areas.
	Produce architectural drawings, 2D/3D renderings, and detailed plans.
	Supervise construction, installations, and site works.
	Manage project timelines, cost estimates, materials, and vendor coordination.
	Ensure compliance with building codes, safety standards, and brand identity.
	Recommend improvements and support facility maintenance.


Requirements


	Degree in Architecture; professional certification is an advantage.
	3 – 7 years of experience in architecture, interior or retail design.
	Proficiency in AutoCAD, Revit, SketchUp, and 3D rendering tools.
	Strong project management and site supervision skills.
	Creative, detail-oriented, and able to translate brand vision into functional spaces.
	Send your CV and portfolio to [Insert Email] with the subject Architect Application.


Salary
N400,000 - N500,000 / month

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CVs and portfolio to: zinnia.agency@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.    

    

        Click here to Apply  
        

    
     




        
        

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

Key Responsibilities


	??Greet visitors warmly as they arrive, providing assistance and directing them as need be.
	??Maintain cleanliness and organization of the entire office, ensuring the office is kept pristine always.
	??Providing refreshments for the office when needed.

Office Assistant / Receptionist Job at Mofefolt Nigeria Limited




        
    

        
        Mofefolt Nigeria Limited is a procurement company that works majorly with General Hospitals in Lagos to provide their medical needs.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Office Assistant / Receptionist

Job Location: Victoria Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	??Greet visitors warmly as they arrive, providing assistance and directing them as need be.
	??Maintain cleanliness and organization of the entire office, ensuring the office is kept pristine always.
	??Providing refreshments for the office when needed.
	??Running errands as the case may be.
	??Assist with administrative tasks such as filing, and photocopying documents, as needed.
	??Provide support and assistance to other staff members as needed, contributing to a positive and collaborative work environment.


Qualifications


	??SSCE or equivalent education and experience.
	??Proven experience as an Office Assistant / Receptionist or similar role, preferably with some experience.
	??Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with a friendly and professional demeanor.
	??Strong organizational skills and attention to detail, with the ability to multitask and prioritize responsibilities effectively.
	??Proficiency in computer applications such as MS Office and other record systems.
	??Ability to remain calm and composed in high-pressure situations, with a customer-focused approach to problem-solving.
	??Proximity to Victoria Island is a compulsory requirement (Lekki, Victoria Island, Ikoyi and Lagos Island).


Salary
N70,000 monthly.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV (PDF Format only) and cover letter to: mofefolt@gmail.com using "Position of Office Assistant/Receptionist" as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Executive Assistant",
  "description": "PaymentLogue -&nbsp;Our mission is to facilitate world-class fintech expertise across Africa. Empowering professionals and businesses with the knowledge infrastructure in fintech operations, product development, engineering, regulations, business, and strategy to drive innovation, foster financial inclusion, and unlock the boundless potential of Africa&#39;s fintech ecosystem

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Executive Assistant

Job Location:&nbsp;Ajah, Lagos
Employment Type:&nbsp;Full-time (Monday&ndash;Saturday support during active cohorts)

About The Role


	We&rsquo;re seeking a highly organized and discreet Admin Assistant to make the Managing Partner, who also serves as the President of Faculty, School of Fintech twice as effective.
	This role blends executive support, project coordination, and operational precision. You&rsquo;ll manage calendars, communication, and documentation while supporting School of Fintech programs, facilitators, and volunteers.


Key Responsibilities


	Manage the Managing Partner&rsquo;s calendar, inbox, and meeting logistics.
	Prepare agendas, notes, and follow-ups for meetings.
	Handle travel, scheduling, and file organization in Drive/Notion.
	Support School of Fintech operations: session readiness, facilitator coordination, student onboarding, and alumni comms.
	Maintain communication channels (Slack, WhatsApp Business, Email).
	Create light content snippets and schedule posts using Canva and Flodesk.
	Track invoices, renewals, and NDAs; maintain clean digital records.
	Provide concise weekly reports and updates.


?Requirements


	Proven experience as an executive or admin assistant (2&ndash;4 years).
	Mastery of Google Workspace, calendar management, and digital filing.
	Excellent written communication and attention to detail.
	Discretion, speed, and calm under pressure.
	Tech-savvy (Slack, Notion, Canva, or Airtable) experience is a plus.
	?Proactive and smart lady (This role is only for ladies).


?Benefits


	Salary: N120,000&nbsp;Monthly (Slightly Negotiable).
	Health insurance
	Paid annual leave
	Sponsored trainings &amp; certifications
	Remote flexibility and collaborative culture.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should kindly send resume to:&nbsp;alanalicia705@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as subject of the mail.",

  "validThrough": "2026-01-02",

Executive Assistant Job at PaymentLogue




        
    

        
        PaymentLogue - Our mission is to facilitate world-class fintech expertise across Africa. Empowering professionals and businesses with the knowledge infrastructure in fintech operations, product development, engineering, regulations, business, and strategy to drive innovation, foster financial inclusion, and unlock the boundless potential of Africa's fintech ecosystem

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Executive Assistant

Job Location: Ajah, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time (Monday–Saturday support during active cohorts)

About The Role
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We’re seeking a highly organized and discreet Admin Assistant to make the Managing Partner, who also serves as the President of Faculty, School of Fintech twice as effective.
	This role blends executive support, project coordination, and operational precision. You’ll manage calendars, communication, and documentation while supporting School of Fintech programs, facilitators, and volunteers.


Key Responsibilities


	Manage the Managing Partner’s calendar, inbox, and meeting logistics.
	Prepare agendas, notes, and follow-ups for meetings.
	Handle travel, scheduling, and file organization in Drive/Notion.
	Support School of Fintech operations: session readiness, facilitator coordination, student onboarding, and alumni comms.
	Maintain communication channels (Slack, WhatsApp Business, Email).
	Create light content snippets and schedule posts using Canva and Flodesk.
	Track invoices, renewals, and NDAs; maintain clean digital records.
	Provide concise weekly reports and updates.


?Requirements


	Proven experience as an executive or admin assistant (2–4 years).
	Mastery of Google Workspace, calendar management, and digital filing.
	Excellent written communication and attention to detail.
	Discretion, speed, and calm under pressure.
	Tech-savvy (Slack, Notion, Canva, or Airtable) experience is a plus.
	?Proactive and smart lady (This role is only for ladies).


?Benefits


	Salary: N120,000 Monthly (Slightly Negotiable).
	Health insurance
	Paid annual leave
	Sponsored trainings & certifications
	Remote flexibility and collaborative culture.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should kindly send resume to: alanalicia705@gmail.com using the Job Position as subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply  
        

    
     




        
        

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Human Resource Officer",
  "description": "Skipper Eye-Q Super Speciality Eye hospital is an International Eye Hospital chain with the presence of 30 in India and 4 in Nigeria handling all types of Eye Surgeries such as Cataract, Retina, Glaucoma, presbyopia, cornea, squint, refractive error and other vision problems, having treated 10+ Million patients. Our patients get same treatment in Nigeria as in US, UK and India. 18 Years in Eye Care. HMO Empanelled Hospitals

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Human Resource Officer&nbsp;

Job Locations:&nbsp;Abuja (FCT) and Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are recruiting an HR officer with excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.
	The HR officer is expected to be knowledgeable with employment legislation and possess strategic and commercial insight to the labor process.
	He/She must display excellent organizational skills, good time-management skills, and the ability to multi-task in a fast-paced environment.


Responsibilities


	Preparing job descriptions, advertising vacant positions, and managing the employment process.
	Orientating new employees and training existing employees.
	Monitoring employee performance.
	Ensuring that all employees are organized and satisfied in their work environment.
	Overseeing the health and safety of all employees.
	Implementing systematic staff development procedures.
	Providing counseling on policies and procedures.
	Ensuring meticulous implementation of payroll and benefits administration.
	Communicating with staff about issues affecting their performance.
	Ensuring accurate and proper record-keeping of employee information in electronic and digital format.


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in human resources or related field.
	Minimum 3 years of relevant experience in human resources.
	Additional training/certification in Payroll Management &ndash; may be advantageous.
	CIPM certification &ndash; may be advantageous.
	Experience as a Skills Development Facilitator &ndash; may be advantageous.
	Able to engage in meaningful negotiation and resolution.
	Knowledge of employment legislation.
	Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
	Full understanding of HR functions and best practices.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their updated CV to:&nbsp;skippereyeqhospitals@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position and location as the subject of the email.",

Human Resource Officer Job at Skipper Eye-Q Super Specialty Eye Hospital




        
    

        
        Skipper Eye-Q Super Speciality Eye hospital is an International Eye Hospital chain with the presence of 30 in India and 4 in Nigeria handling all types of Eye Surgeries such as Cataract, Retina, Glaucoma, presbyopia, cornea, squint, refractive error and other vision problems, having treated 10+ Million patients. Our patients get same treatment in Nigeria as in US, UK and India. 18 Years in Eye Care. HMO Empanelled Hospitals

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Human Resource Officer 

Job Locations: Abuja (FCT) and Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are recruiting an HR officer with excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.
	The HR officer is expected to be knowledgeable with employment legislation and possess strategic and commercial insight to the labor process.
	He/She must display excellent organizational skills, good time-management skills, and the ability to multi-task in a fast-paced environment.


Responsibilities


	Preparing job descriptions, advertising vacant positions, and managing the employment process.
	Orientating new employees and training existing employees.
	Monitoring employee performance.
	Ensuring that all employees are organized and satisfied in their work environment.
	Overseeing the health and safety of all employees.
	Implementing systematic staff development procedures.
	Providing counseling on policies and procedures.
	Ensuring meticulous implementation of payroll and benefits administration.
	Communicating with staff about issues affecting their performance.
	Ensuring accurate and proper record-keeping of employee information in electronic and digital format.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in human resources or related field.
	Minimum 3 years of relevant experience in human resources.
	Additional training/certification in Payroll Management – may be advantageous.
	CIPM certification – may be advantageous.
	Experience as a Skills Development Facilitator – may be advantageous.
	Able to engage in meaningful negotiation and resolution.
	Knowledge of employment legislation.
	Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
	Full understanding of HR functions and best practices.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their updated CV to: skippereyeqhospitals@gmail.com using the Job Position and location as the subject of the email.
